zh.name: VIVIAN WANG
zh.role: 化妆总监 | VIVIAN CELEBRITY 创始人
zh.bio:
资深影视与时尚，专注中英及国际项目：
• 英国电影电视剧造型总监
• 加拿大电影服化道总执行
• 尚美巴黎（Chaumet）高珠晚宴、时装周秀场及明星红毯特邀合作造型总监
• 服务领域：电影制作、短剧、综艺、广告、时尚、婚礼定制、高端定制、明星同款旅拍

en.name: Vivian Wang
en.role: Makeup Director | Founder of VIVIAN CELEBRITY
en.bio:
Experienced in film and fashion, specialized in Chinese/English and international projects:
• Chief Styling Director for UK films and TV series
• Executive Head of Costume & Makeup Department for Canadian films
• Specially invited Styling Director for Chaumet high jewelry gala, fashion week shows, and celebrity red carpets
• Services: film production, short dramas, variety shows, commercials, fashion, wedding couture, bespoke shoots, celebrity-style travel shoots
